layman_description: Sound that plays when this trap or device is triggered.
technical_description: Audio event for trap activation state change.
player_impact: Warns you when traps are about to activate.

layman_description: Sound that plays when this trap or device deactivates.
technical_description: Audio event for trap deactivation state change.
player_impact: Signals when a trap stops working.

layman_description: Sound effect when something hits the pressure trigger of a trap.
technical_description: Audio event for trap trigger point activation.
player_impact: Alerts you when you've triggered a trap.

layman_description: How long after triggering before a trap actually activates.
technical_description: Delay duration for trap activation event.
player_impact: Gives you time to escape after tripping a trap.

layman_description: Whether this trap or block only works once before breaking.
technical_description: Boolean flag for disposable item functionality.
player_impact: Some traps are one-use only before needing repair.

layman_description: Visual effect that appears when this block is destroyed.
technical_description: Particle system reference for destruction event.
player_impact: Makes block destruction look dramatic.

layman_description: What damaged or degraded version of this block appears as you destroy it.
technical_description: Block entity reference for destruction state chain.
player_impact: Shows progression of block damage visually.

layman_description: Visual effect when this block is damaged but not destroyed.
technical_description: Particle system reference for damage event feedback.
player_impact: Shows impact effects when damaging blocks.

layman_description: Alternate 3D model that appears as this block takes damage.
technical_description: Damaged geometry asset reference for progressive destruction.
player_impact: Blocks look increasingly damaged as you hit them.

layman_description: Whether the damage model shows when this block falls due to poor support.
technical_description: Boolean flag for damage model rendering on physics events.
player_impact: Falling blocks show damage before hitting ground.

layman_description: What information shows about this block in building menus.
technical_description: Enum controlling displayed block metadata (Description, Name, Custom).
player_impact: Determines what you see when hovering over this block in menus.

layman_description: Whether this block blocks line of sight for targeting and aiming.
technical_description: Boolean flag for visibility blocking calculation.
player_impact: Determines if you can see or shoot through this block.

layman_description: Special blocking rules for bullets and projectiles specifically.
technical_description: Collision layer filtering for projectile interactions.
player_impact: Some materials stop bullets better than others.

layman_description: Whether this block's texture aligns globally or per-block.
technical_description: Texture coordinate system selection (Local, Global, Direction-based).
player_impact: Affects how textures align on blocks next to each other.

layman_description: How far away this block remains visible before disappearing.
technical_description: LOD culling scale factor for draw distance.
player_impact: Distant blocks might not render to save performance.

layman_description: How much light this block emits if it's a light source.
technical_description: Radiance value for dynamic light emission.
player_impact: Determines how far this light illuminates the area.

layman_description: Whether this block light stays on even when lights are turned off.
technical_description: Boolean flag for light state independence.
player_impact: Some lights can't be switched off.

layman_description: The basic form of this block (cube, water, decoration, etc).
technical_description: Geometry type enum for collision and rendering classification.
player_impact: Determines how this block interacts with physics and placement.

layman_description: How water flows through or off this block.
technical_description: Water simulation directionality flag for flow behavior.
player_impact: Controls water flow mechanics around this block.

layman_description: How much fall damage is reduced when landing on this block.
technical_description: Damage mitigation multiplier for fall impact.
player_impact: Soft blocks reduce fall damage, hard blocks don't.
